locations.name: Bangkok
locations.description: Thailand's bustling capital city, offering a mix of majestic temples, vibrant markets, canal life, and sophisticated dining.

locations.name: Koh Yao Noi
locations.description: A tranquil island escape nestled in Phang Nga Bay, known for its seclusion, stunning karst scenery, and luxury resorts focused on relaxation and spa experiences.

locations.name: Krabi
locations.description: A coastal province renowned for its dramatic limestone cliffs, turquoise waters, beautiful beaches (like Railay), island-hopping opportunities, and gentle adventures like kayaking.
